Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted with exceptional quality. This product embodies innovation and excellence, tailored to provide unparalleled performance and satisfaction. Considering its unique features and benefits, I believe it would be an invaluable addition to your collection. I am offering this extraordinary product to you for $15000. Should you have any questions or need further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of bringing this masterpiece into your possession. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $15,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $15,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $15,000
